description:
Made browser tests fail more cleanly when required stuff is missing.

Some error conditions are such that it makes no sense to continue the test after they are discovered. For instance, if required tools are missing, there's not much point to try to recover the situation. This patch will make it a lot less confusing as the real error will not be obscured by later errors.

R=tommi@chromium.org
BUG=

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=220328
